name: rental_amenities
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool airdna.
Tool description: API for Short-Term Rental Data Analytics | Vrbo & Airbnb Data | Rentalizer
API description: Fetches rental amenities information for a given location using the AirDNA API.

location.description: The location for which to fetch rental amenities information.

currency.description: The currency code for the rental pricing. Defaults to None.
